name: compatibility-reporter
description: Generate a report on the Web Platform features that your website uses, and the browser support of each feature.

browsers.default: last 1 version, last 2 IE versions, last 1 Samsung version, last 1 Android version
browsers.title: Browsers
browsers.description: List of browsers to include in the report, written in [Browserslist](https://github.com/ai/browserslist) format.

excludeVcsIgnoredFiles.title: Exclude VCS Ignored Files
excludeVcsIgnoredFiles.description: Exclude files and directories ignored by the current project's VCS (version control system). For example, projects using Git have these paths defined in their `.gitignore` file.

excludeIgnoredNames.description: Exclude items matched by the `Ignored Names` core config setting.

customIgnoredNames.title: Custom Ignored Names
customIgnoredNames.description: List of string glob patterns. Files and directories matching these patterns will be ignored by Compatibility Reporter.

fileFiltersCSS.title: File Filters (CSS)
fileFiltersCSS.description: List of string glob patterns for files that should be parsed as CSS.

fileFiltersJavaScript.title: File Filters (JavaScript)
fileFiltersJavaScript.description: List of string glob patterns for files that should be parsed as JavaScript.

fileFiltersHTML.title: File Filters (HTML)
fileFiltersHTML.description: List of string glob patterns for files that should be parsed as HTML.
